page.title: 05SHOPS IN CARTMEL - 2
page.content: {TRADE SHOPS (2) {BARNGARTH NURSERIES Mrs. Weir is the owner of the nurseriesand has had the business now for 9 years. She does most of the work herself, but occasionally has someone help her with a spot of digging. Her sales are local and she advertises in local shops. The most popular items are bedding plants which are bought in. {THE ANVIL GALLERY This shop has been in Cartmel for 25 years. The name comes from the adjacent shop which used to be a smithy. Landscape watercolours are the best selling items. {Reported by Sarah Jane Roscoe, aged 10
